sentences.en: Celebrity chefs slice, steam and sear in aspirational culinary shrines of stainless steel and high gloss.
sentences.cn: 名厨们在他们所渴望的布满不锈钢的高光泽的烹饪圣殿中切 、 蒸、烧.

sentences.en: Celebrity chefs slice, steam sear in aspirational culinary shrines of stainless steel and high gloss.
sentences.cn: 名厨们在他们所渴望的布满不锈钢的高光泽的烹调圣殿中切 、 蒸、烧.

sentences.en: Fine music, particularly opera, has become aspirational, like fine wine or foreign travel.
sentences.cn: 高雅音乐，特别是歌剧，就像佳酿或出境游一样受到志存高远者的青睐。

sentences.en: Most of the images that bombard us all are aspirational.
sentences.cn: 轰击的图像,我们都期望最大.

sentences.en: Those expectations are, in turn, pretty aspirational in a low interest rate environment.
sentences.cn: 当然,在低利率环境下, 人们当前的这种回报期望有点不切实际.

sentences.en: Transparency, in particular, is what will ensure that this agreement becomes operational, not just aspirational.
sentences.cn: 特别是透明化, 可以保证这项协议切实可行, 而不仅仅是表达一种愿望.

words.tran_cn: 有抱负的；追求…的；高耸的
有雄心壮志的；（生活形态等）梦寐以求的

trans.tran_en: having a strong desire to have or achieve something
